data.Name: Prototype 2030
data.Tagline: Prototype 2030 is a design collective that turns climate solutions into irresistible experiences.
data.About:
Prototype 2030 is an international design collective, united in the belief that the climate solutions we need can become much more attractive - and will therefore be adopted more rapidly - if design thinking is applied right from their inception. We believe wind-farms can be beautiful, energy storage can be cool, and insulation can be inspiring - if we let go of the current focus on ‘design by spreadsheet’. If we do that, we can turn resistance into irresistible.  

We intend to apply this approach in our individual professional practices, but reality can move slowly. So that’s why we created Prototype 2030 - as a playground, where we want to give the world a taste of what’s possible. 

As much as we love this project, we hope it will be obsolete long before 2030. We hope by then it will have become common practice to have designers and other creatives at the table in climate solution projects. Until then, we hope to inspire through these pages, and invite you to reach out with any questions or feedback.
